options.name: Slinger
options.description: Gain the Dual Wielding Stance which allows you to equip an Ultra Light Ranged weapon in your Offhand. Once per turn, you can make an Attack with your Offhand that does not consume an Action and does not apply your Damage Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Free Action : Double Reload
options.description: Reload up to 2 Equipped Ultra Light Ranged Weapons that have an Ammunition Capacity.

options.name: Reaction : Cover Dive
options.description: When Targeted by a Melee Attack or Projectile, dive 2 Units without provoking Reactions and fall Prone while making an Attack with an Ultra Light Ranged Weapon with a 1d4 Penalty to hit. Gain a +2 Bonus to your Defense Checks against the Attack as well as any Bonuses for Cover in your new position.

options.name: Desperado
options.description: Gain +2 Units of Maximum Range on Ultra Light Ranged Weapons. Additionally, apply your Damage Bonus Modifier to Attacks you make with your Offhand Ultra Light Ranged Weapon.

options.name: Action : Point Blank Overload
options.description: You make an Attack with an Ultra Light Ranged Weapon at a Creature that is Adjacent to you, dealing an extra 1d6 Damage. If hit, a Large or smaller Creature must make an Athletics or Acrobatics Check against the total Damage dealt after Mitigations, or be Shoved 1 Unit backwards and fall Prone.

options.name: Action : Cover Shot
options.description: Make an Attack with your Offhand Ultra Light Ranged Weapon with a 1d6 Penalty and Move a number of Units equal to the result of the d6. When you reach your new Location, you can make an Attack with your Primary Weapon if eligble.

options.name: Master Slinger
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Ranged Weapons
